entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a house-elf who is trying to wake up Harry Potter. He is mentioned as 'sir' by Dobby, indicating that he has some sort of authority or importance in the story.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is mentioned as needing to hurry for the second task.

relationships.description: Dobby tries to wake up Harry Potter by poking him and telling him it's time to hurry for the second task.
